thread.title: Samsung Galaxy S8 stock wallpapers are here, or are they?
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy S8 stock wallpapers are here, or are they?

author: Asif S.
title: Samsung Galaxy S8 stock wallpapers are here, or are they?
text:
Asif S. / 22 mins ago 
The Galaxy S8 and the Galaxy S8 Plus will be unveiled on March 29 , and images of its icons, launcher, and its user interface were leaked recently. The launch event poster of the Galaxy S8 was leaked earlier today. Now, stock wallpapers of the upcoming flagship smartphones have surfaced online. 
We’re not sure if these are actual wallpapers from the S8, so keep in mind that these could be fake. They are also only 1440×2560 pixels in resolution, and going by everything we have seen until now, the Galaxy S8 and S8 Plus are likely to feature a slightly larger display resolution, thanks to the longer displays on-board. In any case, this is all we have at this point, so go ahead and download the images below. 
Let us know what you think of these wallpapers. Don’t forget, you can download stock wallpapers of other Samsung devices from our new Wallpaper Archive .
